name: Toree 2
overview: Toree 2, the sequel to the surprise hit Toree 3D is a bite-sized 3D Platformer with more focus on the things people enjoyed in the first game like fast gameplay, flow focused levels and cute costumes (two this time). - More late 90s low poly aesthetic - Fast gameplay, flow focused levels - Weird elements make a comeback. - 9 levels with unique elements - Some secret characters to unlock - The epic conclusion of the ice cream arc
